A snail? A swan?\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn her extraordinary picture book Alison Limentani introduces children to a fascinating world of wildlife, weight, numbers, and comparisons. Did you know that five starlings weigh the same as one squirrel - or that three rabbits weigh the same as one fox cub? Kids - and parents, too - will be amazed and amused by every surprising and intriguing page.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eAGES: 3 to 6\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eAUTHOR: Alison Limentani has a degree in Animal Behaviour and worked as a zookeeper before training as a veterinary nurse. She is passionate about drawing animals, and sharing her knowledge about them, which led her to complete a Master's of Art in Children's Book Illustration at the Cambridge School of Art in England. She teaches children's art classes at London Zoo and creates images using traditional printmaking techniques. Alison lives in Cambridge, England.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. It comes with a dry-wipe pen, perforated flash cards, and 48 pages of activities to help children master their times tables.\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• Times tables are important mathematical building blocks but can be hard to memorize\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• Colorful photographs and illustrations make practicing them more enjoyable\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• The wipe-clean activities can be attempted, wiped clean, and repeated until mastered\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• Plenty of opportunity for children to put their developing knowledge into practice\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• With tables from 1 to 12, each table has tips and tricks for remembering it, and a guide to the practical uses, such as the 5 times table for telling the time\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• There are 24 perforated flash cards of the hardest ones to remember at the end of the book\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e• The spiral binding means that pages lie flat for ease of use, and there are even tips for good handwriting habits.\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eThis book is a fantastic tool to help children gain confidence in math at an early age.\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Mặt kia của thẻ cho phép trẻ theo dõi và viết số. Được đề xuất cho trẻ mới biết đi, những thẻ này mang đến cơ hội hấp dẫn để bắt đầu nhận biết các con số, kỹ năng đếm và phát triển các kỹ năng toán học sớm. Những thẻ này mang đến một cách thú vị để những đứa trẻ nhỏ đáp ứng nhu cầu giáo dục sớm của chúng. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• Hoàn hảo cho trường mầm non/mẫu giáo \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• 30 thẻ lau hai mặt \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• Độ bền cao cả hai mặt \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• Hình ảnh đủ màu ở cả hai mặt \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• Các góc bo tròn \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• Gói hộp nhiều màu sắc dễ thương \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003e• Bút có tẩy \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan class=\"Y2IQFc\" lang=\"vi\" xml:lang=\"vi\"\u003eHoàn hảo cho những bàn tay nhỏ bé, những tấm thẻ flash này sẽ giúp trẻ học hỏi thông qua những hình ảnh đầy màu sắc phong phú và thú vị. Đây là một trong những lứa tuổi cần được cha mẹ định hướng tốt về giáo dục, bởi lúc này não bộ các em đang trong thời kì phát triển và có thể dễ dàng tiếp nhận nội dung kiến thức một cách hiệu quả nhất. Tri thức của các em giống như tờ giấy trắng cần được vẽ lên những nét vẽ đầu đời tươi đẹp nhất.Cuốn sách giúp bé dễ dàng nhận biết và làm quen với số đếm. Hình ảnh minh họa sắc nét và chân thật, màu sắc sinh động của cuốn sách sẽ thu hút sự chú ý của các bé. Số Đếm - Từ Điển Hình Ảnh Cho Bé sẽ giúp cha mẹ xây dựng thói quen đọc sách, niềm say mê đối với sách cho các con ngay từ bé.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu cp fun!\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\"Ducks overboard!\" shouts the captain, as a giant wave washes a box of 10 little rubber ducks off his cargo ship and into the sea. The ducks are swept away in various directions. One drifts west, where a friendly dolphin jumps over it. A whale sings to another. But as the sun sets, the 10th little rubber duck is left all alone, bobbing helplessly on the big wide sea. Small readers and listeners will empathize with the little duck's plight—and will rejoice at the heartwarming surprise ending.\u003c/p\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn this poignant and funny story, illustrated with strikingly designed collages, Eric Carle takes readers on an exciting voyage of discovery. Following the little ducks as they float to all parts of the globe, young explorers can see for themselves the meanings of directional words and learn simple math concepts, such as counting and the use of cardinal and ordinal numbers. Each creature the ducks meet is seen in its own habitat and behaves in a true-to-life manner, offering a very simple first view of biology and geography.\u003c/p\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\"A\u0026nbsp;wonderful read-aloud for storytimes or one-on-one sharing. It's a definite 10,\" commented\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eSchool Library Journal\u003c/em\u003e in a starred review. \"Beautifully composed illustrations,\" said \u003cem\u003eBooklist\u003c/em\u003e.\u0026nbsp;\"As sublimely simple and endearing as the playthings it portrays,\" agreed \u003cem\u003ePublishers Weekly\u003c/em\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThis board book edition with sturdy pages is perfect to share with toddlers. fun first guide to how to tell the time, this bright and bold lift-the-flap activity book features a clock with moveable hands! Telling the time is a key topic for early learners. This charming and colourful book helps kids understand the basics of telling the time.Fully interactive, the book features lift-the-flap puzzles that help kids to relate telling the time to everyday life - posing questions such as \"It's 8.15 - is it time for breakfast?\", \"Does it take 2 minutes to brush your teeth?\". How to Tell the Time introduces kids to how we measure time using seconds, minutes, hours, days, months, and years. It gets kids learning to tell and write the time to the nearest five minutes. There is a flap attached to the front jacket that opens to reveal an amazing clock with moveable hands. Quiz questions that relate to the clock are found sprinkled throughout the book, encouraging kids to move the hands on the clock face and tell the correct time. Telling the time is often a subject that children find hard to grapple with. This book is just what those children need, as it tackles the subject in a fully interactive and playful way.\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Pigs are pink. Only the chameleon has no color of his own. He is purple like the heather, yellow like a lemon, even black and orange striped like a tiger! Then one day a chameleon has an idea to remain one color forever by staying on the greenest leaf he can find. But in the autumn, the leaf changes from green to yellow to red . . . and so does the chameleon. When another chameleon suggests they travel together, he learns that companionship is more important than having a color of his own.
